channel.title: Recommended Music — Nico Less
channel.description: Recommendations for slow and melancholic music, between Ambient and Experimental. New recommendations once a week.

item.title: loscil — Lake Fire
item.description: The latest album by loscil, Lake Fire, was released on May 2, 2025, and I finally had the time to listen to it. And also a reason. Because whose album could be more fitting for the very first post on this blog?
